      • toString

        public static String toString(Collection<? extends Object> values)
        Convert the collection to a string, using the "," separator between each value. Nulls will be the empty string "".
        Parameters:
        values - The values.
        separator - The separator.
        Returns:
        The string.

        Convert the collection to a string, using the separator between each value. Nulls will be the empty string "".
